new_api_shape["ratings_3"] = item["ratings_3"]        new_api_shape["ratings_4"] = item["ratings_4"]        new_api_shape["ratings_5"] = item["ratings_5"]        new_api_shape["image_url"] = item["image_url"]        new_api_shape["small_image_url"] = item["small_image_url"]        new_document["document"] = new_api_shape        client_side_expected_shape. append(new_document)    return list(client_side_expected_shape)bp=func.Blueprint()@bp.function_name("search")@bp.route(route="search", methods=[func.HttpMethod.GET, func.HttpMethod.POST] )def main(req: func.HttpRequest) -> func.HttpResponse:    # variables sent in body    req_body = req.get_json()    q = req_body.get("q")    top = req_body.get("top") or 8    skip = req_body.get("skip") or 0    filters = req_body.
